metadata.title: CVE-2020-16150 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Lucky 13 timing side channel in mbedtls_ssl_decrypt_buf inlibrary/ssl_msg.c in Trusted Firmware Mbed TLS through 2.23.0 allows anattacker to recover secret key information. This affects CBC mode becauseof a computed time difference based on a padding length.

criterions.comment: mbedtls: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
